Package com.example.hashcache.models.database_connections

Class PlayersConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hashcache.models.database_connections.PlayersConnectionHandler
  • public class PlayersConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all calls to the Firebase Players database

      • makeInstance

        public static PlayersConnectionHandler makeInstance​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> inAppNamesIds,
                                                    PlayerDocumentConverter playerDocumentConverter,
                                                    FireStoreHelper fireStoreHelper,
                                                    com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db,
                                                    PlayerWalletConnectionHandler playerWalletConnectionHandler)
        Create and get the static instance of the PlayersConnectinoHandler class with its dependencies
        Parameters:
        inAppNamesIds - a mapping of userIds to their usernames
        playerDocumentConverter - the instance of the PlayerDocumentConverter class to use to convert documents into Player objects
        fireStoreHelper - the instance of the FireStoreHelper class to use to perform general FireStore actions
        db - an instance of the Firestore database
        playerWalletConnectionHandler - the instance of the PlayerWalletConnectionHandler class to use to interact with a player's wallet collection
        Returns:
        PlayersConnectionHandler.INSTANCE the current instance of the PlayersConnectionHandler class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the INSTANCE has already been initialized

      • getPlayer

        public void getPlayer​(java.lang.String userName,
                      GetPlayerCallback getPlayerCallback)
        Gets a Player with a given username from the Players database
        Parameters:
        userName - the username to use to pull the player with
        getPlayerCallback - the callback function to call with the player once it has been found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given username does not belong to a player

                         GetStringCallback getStringCallback)
        Sets the id of a new document with the userId

        username - the username of the user
        getStringCallback - the callback function to call once the operation has finished. Calls with the userId if the operation was successful, and null otherwise
        Throws:

      • playerScannedCodeAdded

        public void playerScannedCodeAdded​(java.lang.String userId,
                                   java.lang.String scannableCodeId,
                                   android.media.Image locationImage,
                                   BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Update the PlayerWallet collection by adding a new ScannableCode
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user whose PlayerWallet must be updated
        scannableCodeId - the id of the scannable code to add
        locationImage - the image of the location where the user scanned the code
        booleanCallback - the callback function to call once the operation has finished. Calls with true if it was successful, and false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are no users with the given Id

      • playerScannedCodeDeleted

        public void playerScannedCodeDeleted​(java.lang.String userId,
                                     java.lang.String scannableCodeId,
                                     BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Update the PlayerWallet collection by deleting a ScannableCode
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user whose PlayerWallet must be updated
        scannableCodeId - the id of the scannable code to delete
        booleanCallback - the callback function to call once the operation has finished. Calls with true if it was successful, and false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are no users with the given Id
